## mbt build diff

Builds the diff between src and dst commit shas

### Synopsis


Builds the diff between src and dst commit shas

```
mbt build diff --from <sha> --to <sha> [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --from string   from commit
  -h, --help          help for diff
      --to string     to commit
```
